newsitem.title: USA: KRUG retains adviser to examine options.
newsitem.headline: KRUG retains adviser to examine options.

text.p: KRUG International Corp said it has retained Quarterdeck Investment Partners Inc to assist in evaluating strategic alternatives concerning KRUG's Life Sciences division.

KRUG's Life Sciences division conducts research, support and development activities for NASA at the Lyndon B. Johnson Space Center in Houston and provides research and support services to the U.S. Air Force and commercial customers in San Antonio.
Quarterdeck is an investment bank which provides advisory services to Fortune 500 aerospace, defense and information technology companies.
